data.text: @spoonter @marcuskelson Don't know about reporters but I admired each and every one of his well used 'fuck offs'.
@PrincessMattie1 @marcuskelson Did he tell the reporters to fuck off?

@PrincessMattie1 @marcuskelson Agreed. Connolly also has an incisive insight into the human condition. He can see the folly in our everyday behaviours - a modern day philosopher and a very funny human being. Go well The Big Yin.
@abcnews @davrosz @BelindaJones68

@marcuskelson I'm glad to hear this. The funniest night of my life was when i took my son to see Billy Connolly perform at the Opera House 3 or 4 years ago. There were tears and snort laughing. A brilliant funny man.
